Adding CMD supportÂ¶

In order to add support for a new CMD the following functions should be modified:

  1. get-in-params, add names of filters and positions needed to form the color
  2. get-isoch-params, add the columns in the theoretical isochrone where the code should look for the filters used.
  3. move-isochrone, add the extinction equations that define how this effect along with the distance modulus affect the magnitude and color in the CMD.
